questions.question: Do Sea Turtles live for 150 years?
questions.notes: because they say so in Finding Nemo
questions.answer: They average around 80 years to 100 years, so even if one has reached 150 years they would not be considered 'still young'

questions.question: What is the longest living animal?
questions.answer: There is tortoise which is believed to have lived for 250 years, and a clam that was 507 years old

questions.question: What is the main language used for Android or iOS Programming?
questions.notes: I want to try my hand at mobile programming
questions.answer: For Android you would want to learn Java while for iOS the main languages would be Objective-C and Swift

questions.question: Which is faster Merge Sort or Quick Sort
questions.answer: They are very similar in best case senarios with a time complexity of 0(nlogn) worst case merge sort is 0(nlogn) but quick sort is 0(n^2)
